system:
note description: "[ Scored horizontal line. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." appearance: "[ --------------- ]" status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "separator, horizontal, line, score" date: "$Date: 2009-06-03 17:11:49 -0700 (Wed, 03 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79073 $"
class ../interface/ev_horizontal_separator.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR
inherit ../interface/ev_separator.xmlEV_SEPARATOR redefine ../interface/ev_horizontal_separator.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_horizontal_separator.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_horizontal_separator_i.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_horizontal_separator.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR_IMP} ../interface/ev_horizontal_separator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake end
